translation.en: Fuck yes.
♪ We want it all ♪
You need a towel, miss.
I need a drink, Brian, but I'd settle for a towel, thank you.
translation.de: Eher einen Drink, Brian, aber ein Handtuch tut es auch.

translation.en: That closet is magic. Oh, it's just the basics really, miss.
translation.de: -Das ist ein Zauberschrank. -Da ist nur das Nötigste drin.

translation.en: When the apocalypse comes, I hope I'm with you.
translation.de: Im Fall der Apokalypse halte ich mich an Sie.

translation.en: -It would be my pleasure. -[woman chuckles]
Glad to hear luck went your way in the Butler trial.
translation.de: Das Glück war Ihnen im Butler-Prozess hold.

translation.en: -What do you mean "luck"? -[Brian chuckles]
I don't know how you do it, miss.
translation.de: Wie Sie es nur immer wieder schaffen…

translation.en: [woman] Anything decent come in?
There is something in your pigeonhole. Next-level stuff, I'd say.
translation.de: Sie haben da was im Fach. Eine große Nummer, würde ich sagen.

translation.en: Intriguing. I'll take a look.
translation.de: Spannend. Ich sehe es mir mal an.

translation.en: Shall I wait?
No. You should go.
Are you sure there's nothing I can do? Yes, there is, Brian.
translation.de: -Kann ich wirklich nichts für Sie tun? -Doch, Brian.

translation.en: Have a glorious weekend.
There you go, madam.
-[waitress] Champagne? -Thank you.
-[woman] Hi, Sophie. -Hello, darling. Hi.
-[woman 2] Mrs Whitehouse. How are you? -Oh hello.
-What could be bad on this beautiful day? -[woman 2 chuckles]
translation.de: Wie sollte es mir heute schon schlecht gehen?

translation.en: [woman 3] Hello.
-[woman 4] There she is. -Hello, hello.
-Where's your handsome half? -That is a very good question.
He promised he would leave the constituency on time for once, but…
translation.de: Er wollte das Wahlkreisbüro heute mal pünktlich verlassen, aber….

translation.en: -How's the birthday boy? -In denial.
-[man] Thank you. -[woman 5] Enjoy your night.
-[Sophie] Hello. -I don't like the number 44.
Oh, but 44 is the luckiest number in ancient Egypt.
translation.de: Im alten Ägypten war das die höchste Glückszahl.

translation.en: -Highly associated with wealth and wisdom. -Is that true?
No. I just made it up. [chuckles]
-Cheeky Sophie. -[man 2] Happy birthday.
You have half your whole life ahead of you. We are lucky.
translation.de: Du hast noch dein halbes Leben vor dir. Welch Glück.

translation.en: -Where's James? -Let me find out.
-Happy birthday, Mark. -Excuse me. Sorry.
-[Ellie] Lucy. -[Lucy] Ellie, darling.
-[Lucy] Hello. -You've reached James Whitehouse.
Please leave your name and number. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.de: Hinterlassen Sie Namen und Nummer. Ich rufe alsbald zurück.

translation.en: My darling man, where the fuck are you?
translation.de: Mein lieber Gatte, wo zur Hölle bist du?

translation.en: [woman] I counted.
I stood on the kerb, and I counted.
translation.de: Ich stand auf dem Gehweg und zählte mit.

translation.en: And the little green man flashed for a mere five seconds.
translation.de: Das grüne Männchen leuchtete gerade mal fünf Sekunden.

translation.en: -Well, that's not enough time, is it? -No, it's not, Minister.
translation.de: -Das ist zu kurz, was? -Definitiv, Herr Minister.

translation.en: I mean, I think they decided that pedestrian crossings only needed a second per metre.
translation.de: Ich glaube, eine Sekunde pro Meter wurde für angemessen befunden.

translation.en: Now, I know that you do have more important things to consider,
translation.de: Ich weiß, Sie haben Wichtigeres zu tun,

translation.en: but show me an old bird who could manage that.
translation.de: aber welche alte Frau soll das schaffen?

translation.en: First of all, show me an old bird, Mrs Murray.
translation.de: Wer ist eine alte Frau, Mrs. Murray?

translation.en: And I take the safety of my constituents personally.
translation.de: Die Sicherheit meiner Wählerinnen ist mir wichtig.

translation.en: What I want for my family is what I want for Mrs Sibyl Murray of Thurlsdon.
translation.de: Mrs. Murray aus Thurlsdon ist wie Familie für mich.

translation.en: We'll write a letter.
-Right away. -Thank you very much indeed.
-[James] Got everything? Okay. -[woman] Yes, sir.
[James] Straight home, please.
-[driver] Sure. -Thank you.
-Would you go back? -[Sophie] To Corsica? In a heartbeat.
translation.de: -Würdest du noch mal gehen? -Nach Korsika? Sofort.

translation.en: It was the most relaxing holiday of my life.
translation.de: So entspannt war ich im Urlaub noch nie.

translation.en: James taught the kids how to sail, and I sat on the beach and remembered that I knew how to read.
translation.de: James brachte den Kindern Segeln bei, und ich las am Strand.

translation.en: -Four novels. Heaven. -[cell phone chimes]
Oh. Speak of the devil.
[man] I'd be happy to die in Corsica, as a matter of fact.
translation.de: Korsika wäre ein guter Ort zum Sterben.

translation.en: [Lucy] I nearly did die in Corsica.
I didn't know about this thing called anaphylactic shock.
translation.de: ES IST ETWAS PASSIERT. KOMM NACH HAUSE.

translation.en: Yes, it was before I knew about my shellfish allergy. Three bites of shrimp. My face…
translation.de: Da erfuhr ich von der Schalentierallergie. Ein paar Garnelen. Mein Gesicht…

translation.en: [whispers] Sorry. I have to go.
…it blew up like a balloon. It was absolutely… It was just enormous.
translation.de: Geschwollen wie ein Ballon. Es war riesig.

translation.en: -My throat closed off, I got sick… -Sophie?
What's going on?
James can't make it. There's been some sort of emergency,
which usually means a debate about noise pollution, but…
translation.de: Es geht wohl um Lärmverschmutzung, aber…

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Absolutely. Yes.
-Well, then you should stay. -[Sophie] I can't. I heard from Krystyna.
She's not feeling well, so I have to take over with the kids.
translation.de: Es geht ihr nicht gut. Ich übernehme die Kinder.

translation.en: This was so lovely. Thank you.
That was rather embarrassing.
I invented three separate excuses in less than 30 seconds on your behalf.
translation.de: Drei Ausreden in unter 30 Sekunden, und alles wegen dir.

translation.en: You owe me.
I've fucked up, big time.
translation.de: Ich habe Mist gebaut, großen Mist.

translation.en: Does she have a last name?
You've probably met her. She's one of my aides.
-Administrative? -Parliamentary researcher.
So she's new?
Relatively.
And young?
It had been going on for about five months.
I broke it off two weeks ago, right after the party conference.
translation.de: Ich beendete es nach dem Parteitag vor zwei Wochen.

translation.en: It meant nothing.
I was flattered.
It was just sex.
Not that there's ever been anything wrong with that part of us.
translation.de: Was nicht heißt, dass unser Sexleben unzureichend war.

translation.en: You know that.
I'm so sorry, Soph.
There's more.
You're not telling me just to tell me
translation.de: Das sagst du mir nicht einfach so,

translation.en: to unburden yourself.
There's more.
-Is she pregnant? -No. God, no.
The story is about to break.
-When? -Tonight.
The Mail is splashing it tomorrow. Online, late tonight.
translation.de: Morgen in der Mail, heute Nacht online.

translation.en: Chris Clarke's on his way over.
He's coming here? Now? We have to get ahead of this.
We have to figure out how to protect our children from it.
We have to do both.
[woman] Can't believe I haven't started my Christmas shopping yet.
[man] Well, you can buy me a drink and save on gift wrap.
translation.de: Gib mir einen aus, das spart Geschenkpapier.

translation.en: [man 2] Hello!
Called to see if you fancied a drink.
-It sounds like you did. -Join us.
I'm not in the mood for a crowd. [man 2] Well, you should be. I heard about the Butler result.
translation.de: -Mir ist nicht nach vielen Leuten. -Du solltest den Butler-Prozess feiern.

translation.en: -The truth won today. -[door closes]
No, no, no. Kate Woodcroft won today.
Not many lawyers could've pulled that one off.
[man 2] It's the Christmas season. Come and join us. I hate Christmas.
translation.de: -Es ist Weihnachten. Komm vorbei. -Ich hasse Weihnachten.

translation.en: I would have had you over tonight, but Felicity decided to stay in town.
translation.de: Ich würde dich zu mir einladen, aber Felicity bleibt in der Stadt.

translation.en: Oh, how unfelicitous.
[man 2] See you soon?
[Kate] Of course.
Have fun.
[Chris] "Top Tory cheats with aide," that's the headline.
translation.de: "Top-Tory hat Affäre mit Assistentin" ist die Überschrift.

translation.en: I mean, it's not brilliant, but could be worse.
translation.de: Nicht gut, aber es könnte schlimmer sein,

translation.en: God knows these knobheads are capable.
translation.de: so wie ich die Holzköpfe kenne.

translation.en: "PM's friend in trysts in the corridors of power." Don't like that.
translation.de: "Freund des Premiers auf der Balz." Das gefällt mir nicht.

translation.en: Oh for fuck's sake.
"Britain's most fanciable MP
had sex with his female aide in a lift in the Commons."
translation.de: hat im Aufzug des Unterhauses Sex mit seiner Assistentin.

translation.en: Uh, "James Whitehouse, a Home Office minister and confidant of the prime minister,
translation.de: James Whitehouse, Innenminister und Vertrauter des Premiers,

translation.en: uh, conducted his affair with his parliamentary researcher in the Palace of Westminster.
translation.de: lebte die Affäre mit seiner Assistentin im Westminster-Palast aus.

translation.en: The married father of two also shared a room
with stunning Olivia Lytton, 28, during the party conference."
translation.de: der verheiratete Vater zweier Kinder ein Zimmer mit Olivia Lytton, 28."

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, that was fucking stupid. Literally.
[Chris] So she's a classic woman scorned. Is that it? I can't speak for her.
translation.de: -Fühlt sie sich verschmäht? -Das musst du sie fragen.

translation.en: [Chris] But did you speak to her leading up to this?
-Did you know this was coming? -[James] No.
[Chris] "He used her"…
[Chris] Basically, your priority from now on is to rebuild trust all around.
translation.de: Deine Priorität von nun an ist es, das Vertrauen wiederaufzubauen.

translation.en: [James] The party conference is not funded by taxpayers.
translation.de: Der Parteitag wird nicht von Steuern finanziert.

translation.en: [Chris] Think anyone's making distinctions?
Johnny Public bankrolls your salary as a minister in Her Majesty's government.
translation.de: Die Leute finanzieren dich als Minister Ihrer Königlichen Hoheit.

translation.en: No one's paying you to bang the help in a House of Commons lift.
translation.de: Keiner zahlt, damit du deine Assistentin bumst.

translation.en: -[James] She has a brilliant mind. -[Chris] That'd make a better headline.
translation.de: -Sie hat einen scharfen Verstand. -Das wäre eine bessere Schlagzeile.

translation.en: "Minister bangs brainy bombshell."
-Alliterative and to the point. -[James] Christ almighty, Chris.
[James] I don't give a fuck about Johnny Public.
translation.de: Mir egal, was die Leute denken.

translation.en: [Chris] Johnny Public's gonna be reading this in the Daily Mail.
translation.de: Das steht morgen in der Daily Mail.

translation.en: Do you want to have a little chat about it? [James] Johnny Public will support me. I'm sure of it.
translation.de: -Willst du darüber reden? -Sie werden mich weiterhin unterstützen.

translation.en: I expect she'll be dubbed "the ravishing researcher."
translation.de: Aus ihr wird wohl die "bezaubernde Assistentin"?

translation.en: You're not gonna be springing any surprises on us? Such as?
translation.de: -Ich hoffe, du planst nichts, Sophie? -Wie zum Beispiel?

translation.en: Well, announcing that you're leaving. Putting on your side of the story.
translation.de: Trennung. Die Preisgabe deiner Seite der Geschichte.

translation.en: Do you need to ask?
-Of course I do. -Of course she's not leaving.
-Sorry. I didn't mean to-- -[Sophie] Of course I'm not leaving.
We've been married for 12 years. We share two children.
translation.de: Nicht nach 12 Jahren Ehe und zwei Kindern.

translation.en: Why would I throw all that away over a stupid mistake?
translation.de: Soll ich das wegen eines Fehlers wegwerfen?

translation.en: And there's no need to offer my resignation?
The PM will make it clear if he wants that, but he doesn't abandon his old friends,
translation.de: Das würde der Premier sagen. Alte Freunde lässt er nicht im Stich,

translation.en: especially not his closest, and you're one of those.
translation.de: zumal du einer seiner engsten bist.

translation.en: Says so right here.
Besides, sex doesn't have to kill a career these days.
translation.de: Sex bedeutet heute nicht mehr das Karriereaus.

translation.en: You might even gain some fans amongst the older male voter.
translation.de: Du könntest sogar ein paar ältere Wähler dazugewinnen.

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, they're hardly gonna argue with some touchy-feely,
translation.de: Die haben nichts gegen ein Techtelmechtel

translation.en: some fun on the side with a filly.
She's a woman, not a horse.
translation.de: Sie ist eine Frau, kein Pferd.

translation.en: I'm trying to help your husband.
translation.de: Ich versuche, deinem Mann zu helfen.

translation.en: And you, for that matter.
Well, try not to reveal too much of yourself in the process.
translation.de: Tu das, ohne deinen Charakter zu offenbaren.

translation.en: Someone's coming out punching. That is very good.
translation.de: Da teilt aber eine aus. Sehr gut.

translation.en: That is exactly what we need right now.
Uh, so listen. No details, but also no denials.
translation.de: Also: keine Details, aber auch kein Leugnen.

translation.en: Denials have a way of coming back to bite you on the arse.
translation.de: Wer leugnet, der bereut es für gewöhnlich.

translation.en: Therefore, do not elaborate.
translation.de: Führe die Sache nicht weiter aus.

translation.en: The sum of your script is this, deep regret, brief affair,
translation.de: Halte dich an Folgendes: tiefe Reue, kurze Affäre,

translation.en: prioritise your family and constituents,
deflect and dismiss, but never deny. Got it?
translation.de: ablenken, ausweichen, aber nie leugnen. Kapiert?

translation.en: -Who's there? -[girl] Me.
[James] Em?
-Were you sitting on the stairs? -How long?
-Not long. -[James] You should be asleep, darling.
I heard voices.
-Hello, Emily. -Remember Mr Clarke?
[Sophie] Let's get you back to bed. Come on.
[smacks lips] What's that Paul Newman quote?
"Why go out for hamburgers when you've got steak at home?"
Listen to me, you little prick. This isn't a fucking joke, it's my life.
translation.de: He, du Arsch. Das ist kein Witz, sondern mein Leben.

translation.en: I love her. Got it?
Oh, mate. I'm only here because the PM told me to be.
translation.de: Kumpel, ich bin auf Anweisung des Premiers hier.

translation.en: Quite. So do your fucking job, mate,
translation.de: Super. Dann mach deine Arbeit, Kumpel,

translation.en: and help me fix it.
Is it over?
[whispers] Yes.
Yes.
Five months?
It was, as you said, a stupid mistake.
translation.de: Es war, wie du sagtest, ein dummer Fehler.

translation.en: [Sophie] At the party conference?
Where else?
Work mostly. Usually late at night.
translation.de: Meist auf der Arbeit. Für gewöhnlich spät abends.

translation.en: What, on desks?
In the broom cupboard?
On the right honourable leather sofa?
Did the whole office know?
[James] We were careful.
Apparently not.
Hotel rooms?
[James] A few times.
-[Sophie] How many? -Well, I didn't count.
I would like to have a number in mind.
-I would find that helpful. -I don't know. 20, 30.
She doesn't mean anything to me. It was just sex.
translation.de: Sie bedeutet mir nichts. Es war nur Sex.

translation.en: -Nothing's just sex. -But it was, Soph.
translation.de: -Nichts ist nur Sex. -Aber so war es.

translation.en: It was.
I've been so stressed out at work these past many months.
translation.de: Die letzten Monate waren so stressig.

translation.en: I'm honoured to have the immigration portfolio,
but it is impossibly complex and literally life and death.
translation.de: aber es ist auch unglaublich komplex.

translation.en: I haven't even told you a fraction of it.
She… she was just there.
I was weak.
For the life of me, it's a mystery how it even start--
translation.de: Es ist mir ein Rätsel, wie es so weit…

translation.en: That's enough.
I'm going to bed.
-Oh my God. I'm sorry. -[Olivia] Sorry, James.
-Minister. -Olivia.
Can I get you a cab? Yes.
Or you could get me another drink.
[James] I'll keep this simple.
Before you stands a man who made a mistake.
[James] My brief affair with a colleague
translation.de: Meine kurze Affäre mit einer Kollegin

translation.en: showed disrespect to my marriage,
translation.de: war eine Respektlosigkeit gegenüber meiner Ehe,

translation.en: to my family, and to the trust of my constituents.
translation.de: meiner Familie und meinen Wählerinnen und Wählern.

translation.en: As I sometimes say to my children,
translation.de: Wie ich manchmal unter weit milderen Umständen

translation.en: under vastly less serious circumstances,
translation.de: zu meinen Kindern sage, war das

translation.en: "not okay."
Forgiveness and understanding must be earned,
so I don't presume to ask for those yet, but I do ask for patience
translation.de: weswegen ich jetzt keine erbitte. Ich bitte jedoch um Geduld,

translation.en: as I try to repair the damage done to my beloved family
translation.de: während ich versuche, gegenüber meiner Familie

translation.en: and my esteemed constituents.
translation.de: und geschätzten Wählerschaft Buße zu tun.

translation.en: Thank you all.
That's all for today!
-Hello there. -[Sophie] Hi, Ellie.
[Ellie] Hi. It's nice to see you.
It's nice that it's not last week. [chuckles]
translation.de: Gut, dass letzte Woche vorbei ist.

translation.en: Apologies for bailing on Mark's birthday. Oh, don't give it another thought.
translation.de: -Tut mir leid wegen Marks Geburtstag. -Ich bitte dich.

translation.en: We'll be fine. Of course you will.
Sometimes, I think sex is the root of all evil. [scoffs]
translation.de: Sex ist echt die Wurzel allen Übels.

translation.en: That's rubbish. Sex is great.
At least, our sex is great. It's never been a problem for us.
translation.de: Unser Sex zumindest. Damit hatten wir nie Probleme.

translation.en: [inhales deeply] You're lucky.
And a very forgiving person.
translation.de: Und bist ein sehr nachsichtiger Mensch.

translation.en: Not really.
Like the man said, he made a mistake.
A fling is just that.
[children] Bye!
You're right.
If mere infidelity were enough to ruin a marriage,
there wouldn't be an intact family in this whole bloody school.
translation.de: gäbe es keine heile Familie an der Schule mehr.

translation.en: [Sophie] Wow!
It's an eyeball. She can see that.
-Bye. -[Emily] Can't wait to show Daddy.
-[woman] Prime Minister. -Afternoon.
-[man] Prime Minister. -Afternoon.
-Prime Minister. -[man 2] I believe he's in?
[man] Yes, indeed. I'll--
-[man 2] James. -Tom.
Can we get you anything?
Does anyone have chocolate?
Chocolate?
Anything sweet. Just a nibble. We've got Percy Pigs.
Oh cheers.
Still eating sweets, Mr Creosote? [in French accent] Just a wafer-thin mint.
translation.de: -Noch ein Süßmaul, Mr. Creosote? -Nur ein kleines.

translation.en: Thank you.
[James] Thank you for not hanging me out.
translation.de: Danke, dass du mich nicht hängen lässt.

translation.en: Yet.
-Well, this is the worst of it? -Yes.
I wish she hadn't been on your payroll. I wish I had a time machine.
translation.de: -Wäre sie nur keine Mitarbeiterin. -Hätte ich nur eine Zeitmaschine.

translation.en: -[Tom] How's Sophie? -Pretty great.
Oh, she's always been that.
Forgiving.
I guess she's always been that too. No.
This was the first time in 12 years of marriage, I swear on my life.
translation.de: Das war das erste Mal in 12 Jahren, ich schwöre.

translation.en: Don't look so serious. The past is the past as far as I'm concerned.
translation.de: Sieh mich nicht so ernst an. Vorbei ist vorbei, was mich angeht.

translation.en: -Prime Minister, your diary-- -I know. Thank you.
I was planning to introduce the amendment to the immigration bill.
-With your blessing. -Yes. Amend away.
Now listen. Be good to that wife of yours.
translation.de: Und hör mal, sei nett zu deiner Frau.

translation.en: You might think the public are looking to me,
translation.de: Die Leute haben nicht mich im Blick,

translation.en: but they'll be looking to her.
-Mummy, what's a Libertine? -Beg your pardon?
translation.de: -Mama, was ist ein Libertin? -Wie bitte? Hier steht, Papa war ein Libertin.

translation.en: It says here Daddy was a Libertine.
translation.de: Hier steht, Papa war ein Libertin.

translation.en: -[Sophie] What are you doing with that? -It was in the study.
translation.de: -Wo hast du das her? -Aus dem Arbeitszimmer.

translation.en: I told you to stay out of the study. Don't be a snoop.
translation.de: Da sollst du doch nicht rein. Sei nicht so neugierig.

translation.en: -Sorry. What would you like for dinner? -Pizza?
[Sophie] Good idea. Let's do it.
-But, Mummy, what is a Libertine? -[Sophie] Mmhmm?
Um, it was a club that Daddy was in at Oxford with Uncle Tom.
translation.de: Das war ein Klub in Oxford, in dem Papa und Onkel Tom waren.

translation.en: But what does the word mean?
It means someone who likes to have a good time.
Would you like a pepperoni or plain cheese?
-Plain cheese, please. -[Sophie] Okay. I'll call when it's ready.
translation.de: -Käse, bitte. -Ok. Ich rufe, wenn sie fertig ist.

translation.en: Wasn't she helping you with homework? We finished.
translation.de: -Wolltet ihr nicht Hausaufgaben machen? -Wir sind fertig.

translation.en: I'm a Libertine.
No. You're not. Why not?
Ask Daddy about it. Go, go. I'll call you when it's pizza.
translation.de: Frag Papa. Geh. Ich rufe dich dann.

translation.en: [Krystyna] Emily?
[man] Let's go! Libertines!
[man 2] Go, Libertines!
[woman] Sophie!
Fuck's sake.
Please tell me that puddle I stepped in was cider and not fresher piss.
translation.de: Sag, dass ich in Cider und nicht Erstsemesterpisse getreten bin.

translation.en: More likely to be second or third-year piss.
[woman] To making it through our first week.
[Sophie] To escaping Mom and Dad.
translation.de: Auf die Flucht vor den Eltern.

translation.en: -[woman] Sorry. -Sorry, sorry.
[woman 2] She lives outside of the library!
translation.de: Sie hat ein Leben außerhalb der Bibliothek!

translation.en: -Very funny, Alison. -Oh, I didn't think you'd show.
translation.de: -Witzig, Alison. -Mit dir hätte ich nicht gerechnet.

translation.en: -You told me not to be such a spod. -And are you? A spod?
translation.de: -Du sagst, ich soll keine Streberin sein. -Und? Bist du eine?

translation.en: -Yes. -Oh, Holly Berry, Sophie Greenaway.
I was conceived on Christmas Eve.
-Christ. -Yeah. That was the other possibility.
[boys] Chug! Chug! Chug!
-What are they doing? -They're anal chugging.
Anal what?
It's a drinking game the rugby boys like to play.
[Alison] Some of the club boys too. I spot a trio of Libertines over there.
translation.de: Nicht nur von denen. Ein Trio Libertins ist auch dabei.

translation.en: …and, while I will go to my grave
respecting the opinion of the honourable member from Morewood and Barnsford,
I must dispute her objections to this amendment.
translation.de: muss ich ihrem Einwand bezüglich der Änderung widersprechen.

translation.en: The honourable lady is concerned about fairness.
translation.de: Die ehrenwerte Dame sorgt sich um die Fairness.

translation.en: This proposed change to the immigration bill
represents the most equitable approach to both skilled and low-skilled workers
translation.de: bietet Hoch- und Geringqualifizierten mehr Gerechtigkeit als die Gesetze

translation.en: of any legislation in the past 50 years!
-It is more inclusive, not less! -[indistinct clamoring]
translation.de: Er ist noch inklusiver, nicht weniger.

translation.en: Esteemed colleagues,
if I have learned anything in my 44 years on this Earth, it is this.
translation.de: wenn ich in meinen 44 Jahren auf Erden eins gelernt habe, dann das:

translation.en: If it looks like a duck, walks like a duck, and quacks like a duck,
translation.de: Wenn es aussieht wie eine Ente, watschelt und quakt wie eine Ente,

translation.en: vote aye for that duck.
translation.de: dann stimmen Sie für diese Ente.

translation.en: And what about a duck caught having an affair with a duckling in his employ?
translation.de: Was ist mit einer Ente, die eine Affäre mit einem Entlein hatte?

translation.en: What does the honourable gentleman think such a duck should do?
translation.de: Was sollte eine solche Ente tun?

translation.en: -[man 2] Yeah. -[man 3] Yes.
Swim.
[woman] Order! Order!
So he acquitted himself well?
Oh, you mean other than having an affair with a subordinate half his age
translation.de: Bis auf die Affäre mit der blutjungen Angestellten,

translation.en: and fucking her in a Westminster lift before elevenses?
I mean today, in the House. And she's not half his age.
translation.de: Ich rede vom Unterhaus, und so jung ist sie nicht.

translation.en: -Looks it. -Plus, he's popular.
You're the one who told me he's number two on sexymp.co.uk, or whatever it is.
translation.de: Sie sagten, er sei auf Platz zwei auf sexymp.co.uk.

translation.en: He's moved to number one.
Well, that's surely a first for a member of the Conservative Party.
translation.de: Da war ein Konservativer sicher noch nie.

translation.en: Besides which, he's the most naturally gifted politician
translation.de: Außerdem ist er der begabteste Politiker

translation.en: on our side of the Chamber.
[Chris] Still, if he gets full on MeToo'd,
it could start to make your loyalty look ill-advised.
It would make the public wonder what it's based on, Prime Minister.
translation.de: Die Leute würden fragen, wieso Sie ihm die Treue halten.

translation.en: History. Nothing more complicated.
James Whitehouse's famous shepherd's pie.
-Isn't that Granny's recipe? -[James] Only better.
This is version 2.0. We haven't had this in ages.
translation.de: -Das ist Version 2.0. -Den gab es ewig nicht mehr.

translation.en: I make it all the time.
Really? Is that why you had Tuppence walk you through the recipe on three occasions?
translation.de: Ach? Musstest du Tuppence deshalb dreimal um Hilfe bitten?

translation.en: Well, uh…
I suppose it has been quite a while.
translation.de: Es ist wohl schon etwas her.

translation.en: [James] Krystyna.
It's yummy, Daddy.
-Good. -Napkins.
[Krystyna] Mmm. Yes, James. Really good.
[boy] So yummy.
-Would you like some wine? -Please.
-Krystyna, would you some? -No. Thank you.
I'd like to propose a toast.
-[Emily] To what? -To Mummy.
No. Why?
'Cause she's the most wonderful woman I know.
-To Mummy. -[all] To Mummy.
-[Sophie] Sorry. -No.
-[coughs, laughs] -[Olivia] So I read your draft proposal.
I think it's cracking.
[James] Too bad. The hardliners are telling me it's too humane.
translation.de: Schade. Die Hardliner finden ihn zu human.

translation.en: What do you think? Can I have some more?
[laughs] Oh God, sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.de: Oh Gott, tut mir leid. Es tut mir leid.

translation.en: -[James laughing] -Oh, now it's empty.
[James] Well, that explains how you managed to take advantage of me.
translation.de: So hast du mich also gefügig gemacht.

translation.en: [Olivia] Oh yes. Sorry about that.
[woman] Where are you?
[Kate] At the office.
[woman] At this hour on a Friday?
That's bonkers. Come round for a drink.
translation.de: Das ist verrückt. Komm auf einen Drink vorbei.

translation.en: I'd love to, but I got pulled into something.
[woman] Oh, it's the holiday season.
For fuck's sake, live a little, Woodcroft.
I'm already sipping a Scotch, you'll be happy to hear.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, ich nippe einen Scotch.

translation.en: [woman] Good. Well, you can chase it with some fizz.
translation.de: Gut. Den kannst du mit etwas Schampus runterspülen.

translation.en: A kid in my class's parents knew just what I asked Father Christmas for.
translation.de: Die Eltern eines Kindes haben meine Wünsche erhört.

translation.en: -[Kate] Where are Ed and your kids? -He took them to a movie.
translation.de: -Wo sind Ed und deine Kinder? -Im Kino.

translation.en: So I've, more or less, one more hour of peace, quiet, and laundry.
translation.de: Mir bleibt eine Stunde für Frieden, Ruhe und Wäsche.

translation.en: Come on. Please?
We can get pleasantly pissed while you watch me fold.
translation.de: Ich falte Wäsche, und wir betrinken uns.

translation.en: Look, I'll just be distracted until I finish with these papers.
translation.de: Ich muss erst diese Akten durchsehen.

translation.en: What is it?
The usual… [sighs] …but quite high-profile.
translation.de: Das Übliche. Nur in höheren Kreisen.

translation.en: I'm not sure I should take this one. Of course you should.
translation.de: -Ich weiß nicht, ob ich annehmen sollte. -Klar, solltest du.

translation.en: Look, I really shouldn't discuss it.
Oh don't be ridiculous. You can certainly tell me.
translation.de: Sei nicht albern. Mir kannst du es sagen.

translation.en: Love you.
[Sophie] Thanks, Kenneth. See you in a bit.
Yes.
[woman whispering] Is that Mrs Whitehouse?
Isn't that James Whitehouse's wife?
translation.de: Ist das nicht James Whitehouses Frau?

translation.en: -Sophie. -Mrs Whitehouse.
translation.de: Sophie. -Mrs. Whitehouse? -Äußern Sie sich zur Affäre?

translation.en: [man] Can you give us a comment about your husband's affair?
Mrs Whitehouse.
[man] Sophie!
[Olivia] James.
-Hi, it's Whitehouse. -[whispers] Hi.
-Can I take your coat? -Thanks.
-Really? -[James] I know.
Hello.
-Hello. -Hello, darling.
-You remember Lawrence Hughes-Davies? -Of course.
-[Sophie] How are you? -Very good.
-[Sophie] Good. Yeah. -Listen, I was just saying to James.
I've witnessed every kind of weather
in the three and a half decades I've been here.
translation.de: habe ich schon einige Stürme miterlebt.

translation.en: This doesn't qualify as a squall. Not even a disturbance.
translation.de: Das ist keiner. Das ist nicht mal ein Windstoß.

translation.en: Just a bit of rain, dear.
And look… [chuckles] …it's passed.
translation.de: Und sehen Sie, schon scheint die Sonne wieder.

translation.en: Now, boys will be boys,
but I'm sure this one has learned his lesson.
translation.de: Er hat seine Lektion sicher gelernt.

translation.en: My wife always said, "Once, okay. Twice, go away."
translation.de: Meine Frau sagte immer: "Einmal: ok. Beim zweiten Mal: Ade."

translation.en: I left it at once.
translation.de: Ich beließ es bei einem Mal.

translation.en: Enjoy your tea. Hmm?
I'm sorry about that. [chuckles]
You know, I thought I was, um, fine coming here,
translation.de: Ich dachte, es wäre ok, herzukommen,

translation.en: but it's bringing it all back.
translation.de: aber es kommt alles wieder hoch.

translation.en: The affair?
No.
No. My fear.
[James] About what?
I thought we were clear all those years ago.
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir hätten das geklärt?

translation.en: I am not my mother.
I will not live my mother's life.
translation.de: Ich werde nicht leben wie sie.

translation.en: I will not be the long-suffering spouse.
translation.de: Als Ehefrau, die das still erträgt.

translation.en: "Once, okay. Twice, go away." Fuck off.
translation.de: "Einmal: ok. Beim zweiten Mal: Ade." Leck mich!

translation.en: I'm not interested.
And I can't do it, James.
Especially in the fishbowl of politics.
translation.de: Vor allem nicht im Fischglas Politik.

translation.en: I always thought that our marriage was, um…
translation.de: Ich hielt unsere Ehe immer für…

translation.en: …superior. [scoffs]
Immune.
Was that the lift?
[James] What do you mean?
The one that I just came up in.
translation.de: Der, in dem ich eben fuhr.

translation.en: Was that one of the sites of your affair?
translation.de: War das ein Schauplatz deiner Affäre?

translation.en: The one that made the headlines?
Jesus.
[James] I'm so sorry.
I should have found another…
It was thoughtless.
Soph, as awful as this week has been, and everything I put you through,
translation.de: Soph, so schrecklich diese Woche und das, was ich dir antat, auch war,

translation.en: I am grateful for one thing.
The certainty that you are the person I want to die with.
translation.de: Die Gewissheit, dass du die bist, mit der ich alt werden will.

translation.en: Would die for.
Making this right with you is all I care about.
translation.de: Alles, was mir wichtig ist, bist du.

translation.en: [James] You and the kids.
If you tell me to…
I will give up all this.
I swear.
I will stand up right now and tell this room full of MPs that I resign.
translation.de: Ich gäbe jetzt und hier meinen Rücktritt bekannt.

translation.en: Right now.
If that's what you want.
If the future doesn't include you, Sophie Whitehouse,
translation.de: Eine Zukunft ohne dich, Sophie Whitehouse,

translation.en: the future is shite.
[James] You sure you don't want Kenneth to take you back?
translation.de: Du willst sicher nicht mit Kenneth fahren?

translation.en: You'll get home earlier this way.
translation.de: So bist du früher zu Hause.

translation.en: Come on, James!
[Sophie] Come on, James!
Bloody hell, they're fast.
They're unstoppable.
If only he were a bit dim, it might seem fair.
translation.de: Es wäre fair, wenn er wenigstens dumm wäre,

translation.en: But no, your boyfriend got dealt all the best cards,
translation.de: aber nein, dein Freund hat einfach alles,

translation.en: including a spot as an Oxford Blue.
[Sophie] What?
It comes from the Canaanite word for "lord." He's the god of beauty and desire.
translation.de: Vom kanaanäischen Wort für "Lord". Der Gott der Schönheit und des Verlangens.

translation.en: Holly, James Whitehouse is taken.
I'm going to marry that boy one day.
You gonna tell him you're gonna marry him?
He knows.
He just doesn't know that he knows. [chuckles]
translation.de: Er weiß es nur noch nicht.

translation.en: Yes, mate.
[man] Oh, James. Nice to see Sophie here.
translation.de: James. Schön, Sophie hier zu sehen.

translation.en: [James] Thank you.
-Mr Whitehouse. -[James] Yes?
Detective Sergeant Willis. This is my colleague, Detective Constable Rydon.
translation.de: Detective Sergeant Willis. Das ist Detective Constable Rydon.

translation.en: We've been trying to contact you. But your office seemed to have lost track of you.
translation.de: -Wir versuchten, Sie zu erreichen. -Keiner wusste, wo Sie sind.

translation.en: Well, I switched my mobile off while I had tea with my wife.
translation.de: Mein Handy war aus. Ich trank Tee mit meiner Frau.

translation.en: Criminal behaviour, I know. [chuckles]
-May I ask what this is about? -Olivia Lytton.
What about her?
We'd like to ask you a few questions in connection with an allegation.
translation.de: Wir würden Sie gern zu einem Vorwurf befragen.

translation.en: An allegation of what? Rape, sir.
An allegation of rape.
♪ How the mighty fall ♪
